summary: The document is a sworn statement form related to the JFK assassination, involving DOD-affiliated personnel and incident investigations. It details the originator, subject, classification, and restrictions of the document. The statement was made under oath by an individual on 10/03/82, with witnesses and an administrator of the oath listed. It was released with deletions on 03/20/95, indicating the removal of sensitive information, despite being unclassified.
key_findings: The document is part of the JFK assassination investigation records.
It involves DOD-affiliated personnel and incident investigations.
The statement was made under oath on 10/03/82, with restrictions and was released with deletions on 03/20/95.
The document is unclassified but was released with deletions, indicating some sensitive information was removed.
